descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to kill almost ALL NPCs in Skyrim.
Not meant to be used on your Main Character File unless you make a backup first!
This mod DOES NOT allow you to harm or kill children.

WARNING! This mod allows you to kill NPCs that are marked \'Essential\' for a reason. Killing these NPCs has a HIGH POTENTIAL TO BREAK QUEST LINES! Kill at your own risk!

Note: This mod has only been tested minimally. There may be glitches and/or NPCs who still can not die. Please report glitches through PMs or comments.

PLEASE READ: This mod is still a work in progress and requires more work. There may be parts that don\'t work yet. If you wish to help, send me a PM!
author: FlapjacksNsyrup
